title: Unbowed
description: This is no longer available on FictionPressThe Kotka of Feyn are a cat-like species with a unique biological development - they are born either alpha or beta, dominant or submissive. A vast empire like Akansha wouldn't normally have to worry about succession, but a series of scandals in the royal family has left the youngest son, Tallyn, as the only available heir. There's one small problem though - Tallyn is a beta.Status: Complete
author: FarashaSilver
